item.title: Bird Flu Detected In Raichur, Chikkaballapur & Ballari; Karnataka Health Dept Intensifies Surveillance
item.description:
<![CDATA[The Karnataka Health Department has heightened its vigilance after cases of bird flu (H5N1 avian influenza) were confirmed in Raichur, Chikkaballapur, and Ballari districts. The outbreak, detected among poultry birds, has prompted immediate action to prevent the spread of the disease, officials said on Friday.
The affected areas include Manvi taluk in Raichur, Chikkaballapur taluk in Chikkaballapur, and Sandur taluk in Ballari. Samples from dead poultry birds were collected by the Animal Husban...]]>
item.author: Abp News Bureau

item.title: Bird flu cases detected in Raichur, Chikkaballapur and Ballari districts of Karnataka
item.description:
<![CDATA[News Cities Bangalore Bird flu cases detected in Raichur, Chikkaballapur and Ballari districts of Karnataka
Bird flu cases detected in Raichur, Chikkaballapur and Ballari districts of Karnataka
Cases of bird flu (H5N1 avian influenza), among poultry birds have been reported in Manvi taluk of Raichur, Chikkaballapur taluk of Chikkaballapur and Sandur taluk of Ballari, officials said.
As part of precautionary measures, the Animal Husbandry department has initiated culling within 3 km radius of ...]]>
